channel.title: Need help with running runevillage 637 source! HELP PLZ!
channel.description:
I have a big issue. I cant run the source for rune-village 637 rsps, released today. Any help? Plz help and comment. Here is my comment posted on the topic of that thread :|
[quote="coolguy12123, post:17, topic:421111"][quote author=coolguy12123 link=topic=523784.msg3810547#msg3810547 date=1320872957] Ok, I fixed the compiler. I still cant run source. I have an 86 bit windows 7 computer with a jdk version of 26. This is what I put for the run:
[code]@echo off title Rune-Village Server [R-V] Port: 43594. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java.exe" -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pause[/code]
and it still gives me an error when I try to run:
[code]The system cannot find the path specified Press any key to continue...[/code]
Any help now....?????? :( :( :( :( :( [/quote][/quote]
Plz help...... :confused:

item.title: Need help with running runevillage 637 source! HELP PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @coolguy12123 coolguy12123
item.description:
@coolguy12123 wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:3, topic:421152”]@echo off title Rune-Village Server [R-V] Port: 43594. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java.exe" -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pauseTry this?[/quote]

Tried that and it didnt work, but , I found the problem… Apparently, his topic got locked because his server was missing files, so that may have been the reason of why I could not run the source.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with running runevillage 637 source! HELP PLZ!
